description: Interface containing information of the identification of a machine set by the customer

contents.name: Location
contents.description: To be used by end users to store the location of the machine in a scheme specific to the end user Servers shall support at least 60 Unicode characters for the clients writing this value, this means clients can expect to be able to write strings with a length of 60 Unicode characters into that field.

description: Interface containing identification and nameplate information for a MachineryItem provided by the vendor

contents.name: InitialOperationDate
contents.description: The date, when the MachineryItem was switched on the first time after it has left the manufacturer plant.

contents.name: MonthOfConstruction
contents.description: The month in which the manufacturing process of the MachineryItem has been completed. It shall be a number between 1 and 12, representing the month from January to December.

contents.name: YearOfConstruction
contents.description: The year (Gregorian calendar) in which the manufacturing process of the MachineryItem has been completed. It shall be a four-digit number and never change during the life-cycle of a MachineryItem.

description: Interface containing identification and nameplate information for a machine provided by the machine vendor
Contains information about the identification and nameplate of a MachineryItem

contents.name: AssetId
contents.description: To be used by end users to store a unique identification in the context of their overall application. Servers shall support at least 40 Unicode characters for the clients writing this value, this means clients can expect to be able to write strings with a length of 40 Unicode characters into that field.

contents.name: ComponentName
contents.description: To be used by end users to store a human-readable localized text for the MachineryItem. The minimum number of locales supported for this property shall be two. Servers shall support at least 40 Unicode characters for the clients writing the text part of each locale, this means clients can expect to be able to write texts with a length of 40 Unicode characters into that field.

contents.name: DefaultInstanceBrowseName
contents.description: The default BrowseName for instances of the type.

contents.name: DeviceClass
contents.description: Indicates in which domain or for what purpose the MachineryItem is used.

contents.name: HardwareRevision
contents.description: A string representation of the revision level of the hardware of a MachineryItem. Hardware is physical equipment, as opposed to programs, procedures, rules and associated documentation. Many machines will not provide such information due to the modular and configurable nature of the machine.

contents.name: InitialOperationDate
contents.description: The date, when the MachineryItem was switched on the first time after it has left the manufacturer plant.

contents.name: Manufacturer
contents.description: A human-readable, localized name of the manufacturer of the MachineryItem.

contents.name: ManufacturerUri
contents.description: A globally unique identifier of the manufacturer of the MachineryItem.

contents.name: Model
contents.description: A human-readable, localized name of the model of the MachineryItem.

contents.name: MonthOfConstruction
contents.description: The month in which the manufacturing process of the MachineryItem has been completed. It shall be a number between 1 and 12, representing the month from January to December.

contents.name: ProductCode
contents.description: A machine-readable string of the model of the MachineryItem, that might include options like the hardware configuration of the model. This information might be provided by the ERP system of the vendor. For example, it can be used as order information.

contents.name: ProductInstanceUri
contents.description: A globally unique resource identifier provided by the manufacturer of the MachineryItem.

contents.name: SerialNumber
contents.description: A string containing a unique production number of the manufacturer of the MachineryItem. The global uniqueness of the serial number is only given in the context of the manufacturer, and potentially the model. The value shall not change during the life-cycle of the MachineryItem.

contents.name: SoftwareRevision
contents.description: A string representation of the revision level of a MachineryItem. In most cases, MachineryItems consist of several software components. In that case, information about the software components might be provided as additional information in the address space, including individual revision information. In that case, this property is either not provided or provides an overall software revision level. The value might change during the life-cycle of a MachineryItem.

contents.name: YearOfConstruction
contents.description: The year (Gregorian calendar) in which the manufacturing process of the MachineryItem has been completed. It shall be a four-digit number and never change during the life-cycle of a MachineryItem.

description: Contains information about the identification and nameplate of a machine

contents.name: Location
contents.description: To be used by end users to store the location of the machine in a scheme specific to the end user. Servers shall support at least 60 Unicode characters for the clients writing this value, this means clients can expect to be able to write strings with a length of 60 Unicode characters into that field.

description: Contains information about the identification and nameplate of a component

contents.name: DeviceRevision
contents.description: A string representation of the overall revision level of the component. Often, it is increased when either the SoftwareRevision and / or the HardwareRevision of the component is increased. As an example, it can be used in ERP systems together with the ProductCode.

contents.name: DefaultInstanceBrowseName
contents.description: The default BrowseName for instances of the type

contents.name: OperationCycleCounter
contents.description: OperationCycleCounter is counting the times the component switches from not performing an activity to performing an activity. For example, each time a valve starts moving, is counted. This value shall only increase during the lifetime of the component and shall not be reset when the component is restarted.

contents.name: OperationDuration
contents.description: OperationDuration is the duration the MachineryItem has been powered and performing an activity. This counter is intended for machines and components where a distinction is made between switched on and in operation. For example, a drive might be powered on but not operating. It is not intended for machines or components always performing an activity like sensors always measuring data. This value shall only increase during the lifetime of the MachineryItem and shall not be reset when it is restarted. The OperationDuration is provided as Duration, i.e., in milliseconds or even fractions of a millisecond. However, the Server is not expected to update the value in such a high frequency, but maybe once a minute or once an hour, depending on the application.

contents.name: PowerOnDuration
contents.description: PowerOnDuration is the duration the MachineryItem has been powered. The main purpose is to determine the time in which degradation of the MachineryItem occurred. The details, when the time is counted, is implementation-specific. Companion specifications might define specific rules. Typically, when the MachineryItem has supply voltage and the main CPU is running, the time is counted. This may include any kind of sleep mode, but may not include pure Wake on LAN. This value shall only increase during the lifetime of the MachineryItem and shall not be reset when it is restarted. The PowerOnDuration is provided as Duration, i.e., in milliseconds or even fractions of a millisecond. However, the Server is not expected to update the value in such a high frequency, but maybe once a minute or once an hour, depending on the application.

contents.name: DefaultInstanceBrowseName
contents.description: The default BrowseName for instances of the type

description: Contains all identifiable components of a machine

contents.name: DefaultInstanceBrowseName
contents.description: The default BrowseName for instances of the type.

contents.name: Component
contents.description: Represents the identifiable components of a machine.

description: State machine representing the state of a machinery item

contents.name: DefaultInstanceBrowseName
contents.description: The default BrowseName for instances of the type

contents.name: Executing
contents.description: The machine is available & functional and is actively performing an activity (pursues a purpose)

contents.name: FromExecutingToExecuting
contents.description: Transition from state Executing to state Executing

contents.name: FromExecutingToNotAvailable
contents.description: Transition from state Executing to state NotAvailable

contents.name: FromExecutingToNotExecuting
contents.description: Transition from state Executing to state NotExecuting

contents.name: FromExecutingToOutOfService
contents.description: Transition from state Executing to state OutOfService

contents.name: FromNotAvailableToExecuting
contents.description: Transition from state NotAvailable to state Executing

contents.name: FromNotAvailableToNotAvailable
contents.description: Transition from state NotAvailable to state NotAvailable

contents.name: FromNotAvailableToNotExecuting
contents.description: Transition from state NotAvailable to state NotExecuting

contents.name: FromNotAvailableToOutOfService
contents.description: Transition from state NotAvailable to state OutOfService

contents.name: FromNotExecutingToExecuting
contents.description: Transition from state NotExecuting to state Executing

contents.name: FromNotExecutingToNotAvailable
contents.description: Transition from state NotExecuting to state NotAvailable

contents.name: FromNotExecutingToNotExecuting
contents.description: Transition from state NotExecuting to state NotExecuting

contents.name: FromNotExecutingToOutOfService
contents.description: Transition from state NotExecuting to state OutOfService

contents.name: FromOutOfServiceToExecuting
contents.description: Transition from state OutOfService to state Executing

contents.name: FromOutOfServiceToNotAvailable
contents.description: Transition from state OutOfService to state NotAvailable

contents.name: FromOutOfServiceToNotExecuting
contents.description: Transition from state OutOfService to state NotExecuting

contents.name: FromOutOfServiceToOutOfService
contents.description: Transition from state OutOfService to state OutOfService

contents.name: NotAvailable
contents.description: The machine is not available and does not perform any activity (e.g., switched off, in energy saving mode)

contents.name: NotExecuting
contents.description: The machine is available & functional and does not perform any activity. It waits for an action from outside to start or restart an activity

contents.name: OutOfService
contents.description: The machine is not functional and does not perform any activity (e.g., error, blocked)

description: State machine representing the operation mode of a MachineryItem

contents.name: DefaultInstanceBrowseName
contents.description: The default BrowseName for instances of the type

contents.name: FromMaintenanceToMaintenance
contents.description: Transition from state Maintenance to state Maintenance

contents.name: FromMaintenanceToNone
contents.description: Transition from state Maintenance to state None

contents.name: FromMaintenanceToProcessing
contents.description: Transition from state Maintenance to state Processing

contents.name: FromMaintenanceToSetup
contents.description: Transition from state Maintenance to state Setup

contents.name: FromNoneToMaintenance
contents.description: Transition from state None to state Maintenance

contents.name: FromNoneToNone
contents.description: Transition from state None to state None

contents.name: FromNoneToProcessing
contents.description: Transition from state None to state Processing

contents.name: FromNoneToSetup
contents.description: Transition from state None to state Setup

contents.name: FromProcessingToMaintenance
contents.description: Transition from state Processing to state Maintenance

contents.name: FromProcessingToNone
contents.description: Transition from state Processing to state None

contents.name: FromProcessingToProcessing
contents.description: Transition from state Processing to state Processing

contents.name: FromProcessingToSetup
contents.description: Transition from state Processing to state Setup

contents.name: FromSetupToMaintenance
contents.description: Transition from state Setup to state Maintenance

contents.name: FromSetupToNone
contents.description: Transition from state Setup to state None

contents.name: FromSetupToProcessing
contents.description: Transition from state Setup to state Processing

contents.name: FromSetupToSetup
contents.description: Transition from state Setup to state Setup

contents.name: Maintenance
contents.description: MachineryItem is set into maintenance mode with the intention to carry out maintenance or servicing activities

contents.name: None
contents.description: There is currently no operation mode available

contents.name: Processing
contents.description: MachineryItem is set into processing mode with the intention to carry out the value adding activities

contents.name: Setup
contents.description: MachineryItem is set into setup mode with the intention to carry out setup, preparation or postprocessing activities of a production process
